title: FEDERAL AGENCY MAIL MANAGEMENT ACT OF 2017

content.text:
Mr. McCONNELL. Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate 
proceed to the immediate consideration of Calendar No. 250, H.R. 194.
content.speaker: Mr. McCONNELL

content.text: The PRESIDING OFFICER. The clerk will report the bill by title.
content.speaker: The PRESIDING OFFICER

content.text:
The senior assistant legislative clerk read as follows:

       A bill (H.R. 194) to ensure the effective processing of 
     mail by Federal agencies, and for other purposes.
content.speaker: The RECORDER

content.text: There being no objection, the Senate proceeded to consider the bill.
content.speaker: The RECORDER

content.text:
Mr. McCONNELL. I ask unanimous consent the bill be considered read a 
third time and passed and the motion to reconsider be considered made 
and laid upon the table.
content.speaker: Mr. McCONNELL

content.text:
The PRESIDING OFFICER. Without objection, it is so ordered.
  The bill (H.R. 194) was ordered to a third reading, was read the 
third time, and passed.
content.speaker: The PRESIDING OFFICER

doc_title: FEDERAL AGENCY MAIL MANAGEMENT ACT OF 2017
